A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely misused Luke and made his story arc an afterthought\, completely overused Leia's force ability to a laugh out loud degree\, added way too many pretty visuals that did nothing to further the story or develop the characters and as apolitical as I am\, it was hard not to see the SJW slant the movie took. Wanted to go to the movies to escape this type of thing\, really sucks that even Star Wars as to have an agenda.
